answers.answer: Unless there is a problem, maybe none?
At 32 weeks, I had a 3-d ultrasound but that was just for our benefit, not our doctor's.  I didn't get another sonogram until the end of the pregnancy- congrats on your pregnancy.

After the anatomy scan (between about 20-26 weeks) it is not necessary to have another US until you give birth unless, as the others say, there is a problem (breach baby, hypertension, gestational diabetes etc.etc).

question: how many ultrasounds should i have at 32 weeks of pregnancy?
title: 32 weeks pregnant
